body: This category consists of coins and small magic items, such as potions, rings, scrolls, and wands. Such treasure is typically found in the lairs of beasts or as a small hoard in a monster den.
name: Type D, Coins and Small Objects
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Appendix/Treasure Generator/Step 3 Generate Treasure/Treasure Types/Type D/Coins and Small Objects
